translations.translation: In them are two gushing springs.
In them will be two gushing springs.
In these there will also be two springs gushing forth.
In the Gardens are two springs, overflowing with abundance.
In them (both) will be two springs Naddakhatan.
In both of them are two springs gushing forth.
therein two fountains of gushing water --
In both of them live springs gush forth.
In which will be two fountains gushing forth.
In both of them will be two gushing springs.
In them (each) will be two Springs pouring forth water in continuous abundance:
In them (both) will be two springs gushing forth water.
Therein are two gushing fountains of water.
In them are two gushing springs.
In both of them are two springs, spouting.
[55:66] In both of them will be two gushing fountains, rushing with water, unceasing.
(Wherein) in the Gardens (are two abundant springs) and it is said: springs full of goodness, grace, mercy and bestowal of honour and much more from Allah.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فِيهِمَا عَيْنَانِ نَضَّاخَتَانِ } معناه فَوارتان

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فِيهِمَا } أي: في جنتي الأبرار { عَيْنَانِ } منتشئتان من الاعتقاد الصادق، والإيمان الكامل { نَضَّاخَتَانِ } [الرحمن: 66] فوارتان، منتهيتان إلى بحر الحكمة المتقنة الإلهية، { فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ } [الرحمن: 67]
